attributes.action: Impose a windfall tax on recipients of government covid related PPE contracts.
attributes.additional_details: So much of the huge cost of Covid has been hidden from the public and contracts do not seem to have returned value for money. Where this has happened a windfall tax would be an appropriate way to ensure justice is done and the public purse has not been abused
attributes.background: I would like the government to recover monies paid for PPE where profiteering has been rampant and contracts awarded without scrutiny

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596649
